author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of Tamil National Movement staged a demonstration in front of Aranmanai here on Saturday, urging the district administration to initiate action against fake nursing and Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) functioning in the district.

State youth wing secretary K. Thirumurugan, who led the agitation, alleged that the fake institutes were freely functioning in the district, fleecing poor students but the government authorities continued to turn a blind eye.

Taking the poor students for a ride, these institutes charged exorbitant fees and continued to function unchecked, Kan Ilango, State general secretary, said.

They would step up the agitation if the district administration failed to take immediate action, district president C. Pasumalai said.
title: Protest against fake institutes
